title: Access Partner Toolkit Services (request)
description: Access services provided via Partner Toolkit for a specific partner.

action_type.description: The type of action to be performed via Partner Toolkit.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the partner account. Mandatory when multiple tokens were provided during authorize.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
